main event: A civilian reported witnessing a white light, a blue-green light with a trailing tail, and a yellow glow on 27 September 1956.
interesting points: The lead light was described as a steady red light pulsating., The trailing blue-green light created a tail effect., The sighting has been evaluated as possibly being a balloon., There were military personnel in the area at the time of the sighting., The exact length of the observation was unknown.
sighted object: one white light, one blue-green light with trailing tail, and yellow glow
